duties_responsibilities.duty: Placing and tracking raw material orders from manufacturing locations and suppliers.
Maintaining inventory levels and collaborating with R&D teams to understand specific raw material timelines and requirements.
Preparing shipments and generating necessary paperwork for shipments.
Ensuring timely availability and cost-effective delivery of raw materials to support R&D efforts.
Identifying and addressing potential issues related to raw materials, finding solutions to ensure the R&D process runs smoothly.
Demonstrating strong customer service skills and good housekeeping practices.

education_certification.credential: High School/GED and a minimum of 3-5 years of related experience.
